sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Users, FolderOpen, DollarSign, Calendar, Clock, CheckCircle, AlertCircle, Plus, TrendingUp, ArrowRight, FileText } from 'lucide-react'; import AnimatedCounter from '../components/ui/AnimatedCounter'; import OnboardingModal from '../components/ui/OnboardingModal'; const Dashboard = () => { const [stats] = useState({ activeClients: 12, projectsInProgress: 8, outstandingRevenue: 45000, completedProjects: 24, totalRevenue: 125000 }); const [upcomingDeadlines] = useState([ { id: 1, projectName: 'Website Redesign', client: 'Acme Corp', dueDate: '2024-01-15', priority: 'high', daysLeft: 3 }, { id: 2, projectName: 'Mobile App UI', client: 'TechFlow', dueDate: '2024-01-18', priority: 'medium', daysLeft: 6 }, { id: 3, projectName: 'Brand Identity', client: 'StartupXYZ', dueDate: '2024-01-20', priority: 'low', daysLeft: 8 }, { id: 4, projectName: 'E-commerce Platform', client: 'RetailPlus', dueDate: '2024-01-22', priority: 'high', daysLeft: 10 } ]); const [recentInvoices] = useState([ { id: 1, invoiceNumber: 'INV-001', client: 'Acme Corp', amount: 5000, status: 'paid', date: '2024-01-10' }, { id: 2, invoiceNumber: 'INV-002', client: 'TechFlow', amount: 3500, status: 'sent', date: '2024-01-08' }, { id: 3, invoiceNumber: 'INV-003', client: 'StartupXYZ', amount: 2800, status: 'overdue', date: '2023-12-20' } ]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [showOnboarding, setShowOnboarding] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setLoading(false); const onboardingCompleted = localStorage.getItem('onboarding_completed'); if (!onboardingCompleted) { setShowOnboarding(true); } }, []); const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const styles = { paid: 'bg-success-100 text-success-700', sent: 'bg-warning-100 text-warning-700', overdue: 'bg-error-100 text-error-700' }; const labels = { paid: 'Paid', sent: 'Sent', overdue: 'Overdue' }; return ( {labels[status]} ); }; const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { const colors = { high: 'text-error-600', medium: 'text-warning-600', low: 'text-success-600' }; return colors[priority] || 'text-gray-600'; }; if (loading) { return (
{[...Array(3)].map((_, i) => (
))}
); } return (
{/* Header */}

{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Upcoming Deadlines - Left Column (Larger) */}

Upcoming Deadlines

View all
{upcomingDeadlines.map((deadline) => (

{deadline.projectName}

{deadline.client}

Due {new Date(deadline.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()}

{deadline.daysLeft} days left

{deadline.priority} priority

))}
{/* Recent Invoices - Right Column (Smaller) */}

Recent Invoices

View all
{recentInvoices.map((invoice) => (

{invoice.invoiceNumber}

{getStatusBadge(invoice.status)}

{invoice.client}

${invoice.amount.toLocaleString()} {new Date(invoice.date).toLocaleDateString()}
))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Add New Client

Manage your client relationships

Create Invoice

Generate and send invoices

View Analytics

Track your business performance

{/* Onboarding Modal */} setShowOnboarding(false)} />
); }; export default Dashboard;
